data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mendes, Humberto F., Andersen, Trond, Hagenlund, Linn K. (2011): New species and records of Antillocladius Saether and Litocladius Mendes, Andersen et Saether from Brazil and Costa Rica (Chironomidae: Orthocladiinae). Zootaxa 2915: 39-51, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.200756
